AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: huge barn
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A huge barn with space for 6 farm animals, plus an exterior pen so herbivores can graze. Includes shelves with hay to feed the animals. Fits a 20x20 tile area
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Reel

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: small barn
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A small barn with space for 4 farm animals, plus boxes for 3 smaller ones, and an exterior pen so herbivores can graze. Includes shelves with hay to feed the animals.

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: tiny barn
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A tiny barn with 5 animal beds and 2 sleeping boxes for small animals, as well as an exterior pen separated in two grassy areas so herbivores can graze.

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: animal processing
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: An integrated animal processing center with a small outdoors pen, a butchery and two stoves.

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: animal processing, modern
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A modern, integrated animal processing center with a small outdoors pen, butchery tables, two electric stoves and a walk-in freezer.

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: circle barn
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: A medium sized animal barn for square haters, surrounded by walls to keep your animals safe and comes with a warm place for your animals to sleep during cold days.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Kolopo

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.label: nutri-paste barn
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.description: An animal barn built with fireproof walls, and a built-in system to feed the animals using nutrient paste. If you have Vanilla Furniture Expanded it will include an electric butchery.
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabDef.author: Woofwoofwoofwoofwoofwoofwoof
